Strong's Hebrew 5329: 1) to excel, be bright, be preeminent, be perpetual, be overseer, be enduring
1a) (Niphal) enduring (participle)
1b) (Piel) to act as overseer or superintendent or director or chief
Strong's Hebrew 4210: 1) melody, psalm

beloved
1) youngest son of Jesse and second king of Israel

Strong's Hebrew 6030: 1) to answer, respond, testify, speak, shout
1a) (Qal)

1a2) to testify, respond as a witness
1b) (Niphal)
1b1) to make answer
1b2) to be answered, receive answer

3) (Qal) to dwell

the existing One
1) the proper name of the one true God
1a) unpronounced except with the vowel pointings of H0136

Strong's Hebrew 3117: 1) day, time, year
1a) day (as opposed to night)
1b) day (24 hour period)

1b2) as a division of time

1c) days, lifetime (pl.)
1d) time, period (general)
1e) year
1f) temporal references

1f2) yesterday
1f3) tomorrow

Strong's Hebrew 7682: 1) to be high, be inaccessibly high
